text: "Halo" is the first single off rock band SOiL's second studio album, Scars.https://www.amazon.co.uk/Scars-SOiL/dp/B00005NQJZ The video is filmed in a rundown house, lit by lamps and sunlight through boarded-up windows.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RFc-2aNZ6VY Towards the end of the video, the band can be seen walking on the walls and ceiling, when their instruments begin to break, seemingly through the violence of their performance.
